original_text: There were descendants of Hebron: Hashabiah and his relatives served as officers on the west side of the Jordan River. There were 1,700 of those men who could work well. They had authority for the work the people did to serve the Lord and the king.
korean_text: 헤브론 자손 중에 하사뱌와 그의 동족 용사 천 칠백 명은 요단 서쪽에서 이스라엘을 주관하여 여호와의 모든 일과 왕을 섬기는 직임을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: served as officers on the west side of the Jordan River.
They had authority for the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 일에 대한 권위를 가졌으며

sentences.original_text: the people did to serve the Lord and the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 주님과 왕을 섬기기 위해 하는 일이었습니다.
